import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Footer(_ref){let{company,links}=_ref;const{href,name}=company;const{size}=typography;const renderLinks=()=>links.map(link=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBox,{component:"li",px:2,lineHeight:1,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{href:link.href,target:"_blank",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDTypography,{variant:"button",fontWeight:"regular",color:"text",children:link.name})})},link.name));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MDBox,{width:"100%",display:"flex",flexDirection:{xs:"column",lg:"row"},justifyContent:"space-between",alignItems:"center",px:1.5,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MDBox,{display:"flex",justifyContent:"center",alignItems:"center",flexWrap:"wrap",color:"text",fontSize:size.sm,px:1.5,children:["\xA9 ",new Date().getFullYear(),", made with",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBox,{fontSize:size.md,color:"text",mb:-0.5,mx:0.25,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{color:"inherit",fontSize:"inherit",children:"favorite"})}),"by",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{href:href,target:"_blank",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MDTypography,{variant:"button",fontWeight:"medium",children:["\xA0",name,"\xA0"]})}),"&",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{href:"https://updivision.com",target:"_blank",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDTypography,{variant:"button",fontWeight:"medium",children:"\xA0UPDIVISION\xA0"})}),"for a better web."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBox,{component:"ul",sx:_ref2=>{let{breakpoints}=_ref2;return{display:"flex",flexWrap:"wrap",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"center",listStyle:"none",mt:3,mb:0,p:0,[breakpoints.up("lg")]:{mt:0}};},children:renderLinks()})]});}// Setting default values for the props of Footer
Footer.defaultProps={company:{href:"https://www.creative-tim.com/",name:"Creative Tim"},links:[{href:"https://www.creative-tim.com/",name:"Creative Tim"},{href:"https://www.updivision.com/",name:"UPDIVISION"},{href:"https://www.creative-tim.com/presentation",name:"About Us"},{href:"https://www.creative-tim.com/blog",name:"Blog"},{href:"https://www.creative-tim.com/license",name:"License"}]};// Typechecking props for the Footer
